page.title: 05 The Day of Rest.
page.content: It was decided to make a brief study of the way in which leisure time has changed over the past 25 years. Twenty households throughout the area were each given a questionnaire which tried to ascertain whether or not Sunday has changed during the period studied. The sample was tiny but showed significant decreases in Sunday School attendance (80%),going to the cinema or theatre (71%),and formal Sunday tea (33%). Significant increases included shopping (66%) and working on and cleaning the car (50%) and (42%) respectively. There was a general decrease (20-30%) in the cooked breakfast,church attendance and entertaining visitors. Increases were revealed in gardening,D.I.Y work,television viewing and sleep!However the traditional Sunday lunch was as popular as ever.
